[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1503995351530{margin-top: -110px !important;}" el_class="mobile-margin-top-0"][vc_column][rev_slider_vc alias="home-12"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1503996480474{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}" el_id="demo-section" el_class="demo-section mobile-padding-top-30 mobile-padding-bottom-0"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="12 Pixel Perfect Demos" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:55px|text_align:center" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]

Do not have time to start from scratch? Install a template in just minutes and start customising it.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1503996665385{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}" el_class="mobile-padding-top-0 mobile-padding-bottom-30"][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2448" title="Home Page 1" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fhome-1%2F|||" animation_type=""][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2445" title="Home Page 4" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fhome-4%2F|||" animation_type=""][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2442" title="Home Page 7" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fhome-7%2F|||" animation_type=""][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2439" title="Home Page 10" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fhome-10%2F|||" animation_type=""][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2447" title="Home Page 2" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fhome-2%2F|||" animation_type=""][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2444" title="Home Page 5" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fhome-5%2F|||" animation_type=""][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2441" title="Home Page 8" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fhome-8%2F|||" animation_type=""][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2438" title="Home Page 11" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fhome-11%2F|||" animation_type=""][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2446" title="Home Page 3" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fhome-3%2F|||" animation_type=""][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2443" title="Home Page 6" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fhome-6%2F|||" animation_type=""][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2440" title="Home Page 9" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fhome-9%2F|||" animation_type=""][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2546" title="Home Page 12" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fhome-12%2F|||" animation_type=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1503997059428{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}" el_id="features-section" el_class="features-section mobile-padding-top-30 mobile-padding-bottom-30"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Theme Features" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:55px|text_align:center|line_height:1" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="bold"][vc_column_text]

What makes Kodo so powerful?

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2490" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="01.WooCommerce Compatibility" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731690514{border-bottom-width: 30px !important;}"]Kodo is the perfect theme for your shop or your clients websites as an agency or freelancer.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2493" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="04.Drag & Drop Sliders Builder" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731698948{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Create amazing and responsive sliders with never be easier with Revolution Slider and it's included in Kodo for free.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2495" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="07.One Click Demo Importer" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731706718{border-bottom-width: 30px !important;}"]Fully automated One Click Demo Content Importer will recreate our demo website on your server in a minute.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2498" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="10.Powerful Ajax Shop" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731717142{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]You can add ajax filter for attributes, product categories, lazy load, infinite scroll, add to cart.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2500" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="13.Beautiful Shopping Experience" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731728189{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Everything you're looking for in eCommerce theme and nothing more. Stronger. Faster. Smarter.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2504" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="16.Off-Canvas Shopping Cart" el_class="demo-box"]Allow your clients to see the products they've selected in a glance, with the possibility to add or remove products without being forced to navigate back and forth across the site.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2507" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="19.Blogging in Style" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731737948{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Give your blog and extra oompht! Kodo comes with 2 beautiful blog layout to help you make your content stand out and grab the internet.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2510" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="22.SEO Optimized" el_class="demo-box"]The Theme is perfect to get brilliant result on Search Engine Ranking. Built in performance options will ensure that your website loads fast and run smoothly. It comes with clean and optimised code. It's compatible with most of SEO plugins (especially with SEO Yoast Plugin)[/CleverFeatureBox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2491" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="02.Mobile Optimized Design" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731758751{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Quick and easy to use the most important thing for selling product on mobile. Kodo is fully responsive and very close to a native app.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2496" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="05.Clever Mega Menu for Visual Composer included" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731767303{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Clever Mega Menu is an easy to use Mega Menu Plugin For Visual Composer. This WordPress plugin is a user-friendly, highly customizable, responsive Mega Menu.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2501" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="08.Unlimited Header Styles" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731776246{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Check out a few real-life example of site headers created with Kodo.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2501" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="11.Unlimited Product Page Layouts" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731782882{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Kodo included unlimited product page layout options.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2505" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="14.Catalog Mode" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731789983{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Choose to turn off the eCommerce functionality of the theme, and use WooCommerce for cataloging purposes instead. It can be easily turned on or off from the Customizer, which makes it ideal of you decide to start SELLING online at a later time.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2508" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="17.Built-in Live Search" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731797081{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Search products, pages or blog posts instantly.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2511" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="20.PSD Included" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731804667{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]PSD version is included when you purchase Kodo. After purchase just contact us to get the downloadable.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2512" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="23.Reliable Support" el_class="demo-box"]We care about our clients very much. Theme includes 100% free premium support. If you have a questions, contact us and we will answer your question shortly and resolve your issue. We are happy to hear from you.[/CleverFeatureBox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2492" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="03.Powerful Page Builder" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731826530{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Building anything with Drag & Drop page builder and large element library.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2494" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="06.Unlimited Options" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731833670{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Quick setup, customize anything with Live Customizer Options panel. Save tons of times and there's no coding required[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2497" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="09.Unlimited Category Layouts" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731841962{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Unlimited different possibilities to list your products.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2499" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="12.Product Variation Swatches" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731848764{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]You can swatch product attributes with color, size or any attributes with open swatch plugin.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2503" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="15.Tailored Quick View" el_class="demo-box" css=".vc_custom_1503731855557{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]Shoppers love to get a good visual sense of the product before purchasing. Provide a beautiful user experience while driving all eyeballs to the products you're offering.[/CleverFeatureBox][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2506" style="after-box" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f3f3f3" title="18.Instagram Shop" el_class="demo-box"]Sale your products over your Instagram Feed. Add more shoppable links by clicking on your Instagram Feed tab.[/CleverFeatureBox][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1503997262026{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}" el_class="mobile-padding-top-30 mobile-padding-bottom-30"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Shop Layouts" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:55px|text_align:center|line_height:1" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="bold"][vc_column_text]

Do not have time to start from scratch? Install a template in just minutes and start customising it.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1503733158409{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2527" title="Shop Layouts 01" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fshop%2F|||" animation_type=""][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2530" title="Shop Layouts 04" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fshop%2F|||" animation_type=""][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2528" title="Shop Layouts 02" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fshop%2F|||" animation_type=""][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2529" title="Shop Layouts 03" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fshop%2F|||" animation_type=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1503997255604{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}" el_class="mobile-padding-top-30 mobile-padding-bottom-30"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Product Detail Layout" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:55px|text_align:center|line_height:1" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="bold"][vc_column_text]

Kodo is designed to make your life easier. Every product layout has been optimized to fit perfectly with your needs.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1503733158409{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2531" title="Product Detail 01" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fproduct%2Flose-ovearsized-shirt%2F|||" animation_type=""][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2532" title="Product Detail 02" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fproduct%2Fcotton-bermuda-shorts%2F|||" animation_type=""][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2533" title="Product Detail 03" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fproduct%2Fcanada-terrazzo-scarf%2F|||" animation_type=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1503997272961{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}" el_class="mobile-padding-top-30 mobile-padding-bottom-30"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Blog Layout" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:55px|text_align:center|line_height:1" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="bold"][vc_column_text]

Show your posts in different ways by using blog layouts.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1503733158409{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2534" title="Blog Layout 01" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fcategory%2Fblog%2F|||" animation_type=""][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2547" title="Blog Layout 02" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Fcategory%2Fblog%2F|||" animation_type=""][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverDemoBox type="image" style="inline" image="2535" title="Blog Layout 03" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwp.rivertheme.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2Ffashion-wakes-up-to-the-older-woman%2F|||" animation_type=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1503997396459{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}" el_id="support-section" el_class="support-section mobile-padding-top-30 mobile-padding-bottom-50"][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="Get Support" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:55px|text_align:center|line_height:1" use_theme_fonts="yes" el_class="bold"][vc_column_text]

Find answers to all of your questions here.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1503982709871{padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2543" style="before" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f5f5f5" title="Documentation" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fdoc.zootemplate.com%2Fzoo-kodo%2F|||" el_class="style-3"]We provide full documentation so you can learn how to setup this theme step by step and use it?s options and features.[/CleverFeatureBox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2543" style="before" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f5f5f5" title="Video Tutorials" link="url:%23||target:%20_blank|" el_class="style-3"]Watch our video tutorials, step by step instructions to set up the theme.[/CleverFeatureBox][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][CleverFeatureBox type="image" image="2545" style="before" align="text-center" box_bg_type="color" box_bg_color="#f5f5f5" title="Help Desk" link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fmember.zootemplate.com%2Fhelpdesk%2F|||" el_class="style-3"]Our team is ready to help you, for any problems youâ€™ve got with the theme.[/CleverFeatureBox][/vc_column][/vc_row]
